articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Australian man and his dog rescued by Mexican tuna boat after drifting 3 months in the Pacific Ocean - WJAR
articles.description: An Australian sailor who had been adrift at sea with his dog for three months has been rescued by a Mexican tuna boat in international waters.

articles.author: Fareha Naaz
articles.title: This Australian state has refused to host Commonwealth Games, ‘not a difficult decision’, says Premier; here's why | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The Australian state has withdrawn from hosting the 2026 Commonwealth Games due to major cost blow-outs, leaving organisers scrambling to keep the event afloat. State Premier Daniel Andrews said the estimated cost of Aus$2 billion had ballooned to Aus$7 billi…
articles.content: The Victoria state in Australia has withdrawn from hosting the 2026 Commonwealth Games, citing significant cost overruns. The initial estimated budget of Aus$2 billion escalated to approximately Aus$… [+2699 chars]
